text: Egha datɨrɨghɨn akar pumuning iti, kar Godɨn akar dɨkɨrɨzim, koma Godɨn arazir uan ziam dɨborim, aning otevkɨnighan kogham. God uabɨ ifarir puvatɨ. Kamaghɨn e gumazamizir ara ghua Godɨn boroghɨn mongeziba, e Godɨn akar dɨkɨrɨzim gɨnɨghnɨgh egh e uan naviba gavgavim dar anɨng, egh bizir aghuir e fogha iniamiba mɨzuamvɨra ikiam.
